overview: Michael Collado is a serial entrepreneur, C-level executive, and attorney with more than 20 years of telecommunications and information technology experience. Mr. Collado joined VIP Room after having served as an entrepreneur-in-residence at ExtraNet Venture Partners, LLC. Prior to joining EVP, Mr. Collado founded and spent 12 years at ExtraNet Telecommunications, Inc, a New York City-based co-location and facilities management company that merged with Switch & Data Facilities (now Equinix) in 2000. Mr. Collado holds the degrees of Bachelor of Science in Management from Binghamton University and Doctor of Law from Brooklyn Law School.
